title: Need guidance.
body:
Hello, my name is Thomas Roberts i am 19 and i am from New Zealand.
Growing up, i was never taught how much the worlds work force was governed by qualifications and experience. There were those kids (unlike me) who invested their time into receiving these. Riot, i'm just a kid.
Well a kid at heart but i love this game more than anything, i'm not even good at it. Check the stats on my account. (stiffcamel). One day i will somehow work for riot, i don't care if i have to swim across the pacific just to serve coffee for interns. I'll be there one day.
It'll be fun too. ;-)

replies.body: You called for Guidance, and here I am :) Is there any way I may be able to assist you?

If you haven't already, I'd definitely recommend taking a look at the various Career pages on the Riot Games website, such as the [Open Jobs](https://www.riotgames.com/careers), [Working at Riot](https://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150817/547/working-riot), [University Programs](https://www.riotgames.com/university-programs) and [Internship Info](https://www.riotgames.com/internship-info) pages.
